Question
========
  
In a study of well-being, the following variables are used: perceived health ($X_{1}$), number of friandds ($X_{2}$) and well-being ($Y$). It turns out that both $X_{1}$ if $X_{2}$ have an effect on $Y$, but that $X_{1}$ and $X_{2}$ onderling niet samandhangand. Van welke multivariate relatie is hier sprake?
  
Answerlist
----------
* Interactie
* Meerdere oorzakand
* Mediatie
* Directe and indirecte effectand

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
